languages.text: [Вызывающе ухмыльнуться] "И что ты сделаешь, если слухи правдивы?"
[Sneer defiantly] "And what would you do if the rumours turned out to be true?"
languages.original_text: [Вызывающе ухмыльнуться] "И что ты сделаешь, если слухи правдивы?"

traits.locale_text: [Sneer defiantly] "So what are you going to do if the rumours are true?"
[Sneer defiantly] "So what are you going to do if the rumours are true?"
[Sneer defiantly] "And what would you do if the rumours turn out to be true?"
[Sneer defiantly] "And what would you do if the rumours turn out to be true?"
[Sneer defiantly] "And what would you do if the rumours turned out to be true?"
[Sneer defiantly] "And what would you do if the rumours turned out to be true?"

languages.text: [Afficher un sourire provocateur] « Et que feriez-vous si ces rumeurs étaient vraies ? »
languages.original_text: [Sneer defiantly] "And what would you do if the rumours turned out to be true?"

traits.locale_text: [Afficher un sourire provocateur] « Et que feriez-vous si ces rumeurs étaient vraies ? »

languages.text: [Sonreír con descaro] «¿Y qué haría usted si esos rumores resultaran ser ciertos?».
languages.original_text: [Sneer defiantly] "And what would you do if the rumours turned out to be true?"

traits.locale_text: [Sonreír con descaro] «¿Y qué haría usted si esos rumores resultaran ser ciertos?».

languages.text: [挑衅地冷笑]“如果那些谣言都是真的，你打算怎么办？”
languages.original_text: [Sneer defiantly] "And what would you do if the rumours turned out to be true?"

traits.locale_text: [挑衅地冷笑]“如果那些谣言都是真的，你打算怎么办？”

languages.text: [反抗的な態度で]「もし、その噂が本当だとなったら、どうするつもりだ？」
languages.original_text: [Sneer defiantly] "And what would you do if the rumours turned out to be true?"

traits.locale_text: [反抗的な態度で]「もし、その噂が本当だとなったら、どうするつもりだ？」

languages.text: [Trotzig schnauben] "Und was würdet Ihr tun, wenn die Gerüchte sich als wahr entpuppen?"
languages.original_text: [Sneer defiantly] "And what would you do if the rumours turned out to be true?"

traits.locale_text: [Trotzig schnauben] "Und was würdet Ihr tun, wenn die Gerüchte sich als wahr entpuppen?"

languages.text: [Ona kafa tut] "Peki bu söylentiler doğru ise ne yapacaksın?"
languages.original_text: [Sneer defiantly] "And what would you do if the rumours turned out to be true?"
